scripts.dev_build: cat src/js/modules/*js > application.js && cat app.js >> application.js
scripts.dev_place: npm run dev_run && cp -r mvpapp4.mako mvpapp4/templates/ && cp -r mvpapp4.xml mvpapp4/config/ && cp -r src/css/* mvpapp4/static/css/ && cp -r src/js/lib/* mvpapp4/static/js/lib && cp -r application.js mvpapp4/static/js/ && npm run dev_cp
